description: This file defines theming and styling utilities for a Flutter calculator app, including an enum for button emphasis levels, theme data configurations for light and dark modes, and helper methods for button colors and text styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides centralized theme data and styling helpers for light and dark themes in the calculator app.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns ThemeData configured for the light mode of the app.

methods.name: dark
methods.description: Returns ThemeData configured for the dark mode of the app.

methods.name: keyBackground
methods.description: Determines the background color of calculator keys based on emphasis level and current theme brightness.

methods.name: keyForeground
methods.description: Determines the text color for calculator keys based on emphasis level and current theme brightness.

methods.name: exprTextStyle
methods.description: Provides TextStyle for the expression line with appropriate font and color based on theme.

methods.name: resultTextStyle
methods.description: Provides TextStyle for the calculation result with appropriate font and color based on theme.
